alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Geauga; Lorain (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 10:34AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A band of heavy lake effect snow will affect Geauga...Cuyahoga and northeastern Lorain Counties Until 1130 AM EDT.... At 1030 AM EDT, radar indicated a band of heavy snow extending from Bay Village to Brooklyn to South Russell, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Visibility dropping to less than one half mile at times... Up to 1 inch of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Cleveland, Lorain, Parma, Lakewood, Cleveland Heights, Westlake, North Ridgeville, Solon, Avon Lake, Warrensville Heights, South Russell, Middlefield, Burton, Highland Hills, Chesterland, North Olmsted, Garfield Heights and Shaker Heights. Use extra caution if you must travel, especially persons traveling on interstates 90, 480, 71, 77, and 271 in and around the Greater Cleveland area. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents.
